definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Sam's shop stocks short spotted socks.
sentences.chinese: 森姆的店子备有圆点短袜。

sentences.english: Pop dot long T collocation tooling tall waist trousers, small lovely overflow.
sentences.chinese: 波普圆点长T搭配工装高腰裤，小可爱洋溢。

sentences.english: The most commonly used paragraph opener is the "bullet".
sentences.chinese: 最常用的起段符号是圆点。

sentences.english: The release number and the associated dot are optional.
sentences.chinese: 发布号和其相应的圆点是可选的。

sentences.english: The system of representing letters and figures by raised dots is called Braille.
sentences.chinese: 用突起的圆点代表字母和数字系统叫盲人点字法。

sentences.english: Soundless as dots on a disk of snow.
sentences.chinese: 积雪的盘子上的圆点般阒寂。

sentences.english: Draw a horizontal timeline with a dot at each end.
sentences.chinese: 画一个每段结尾都带有圆点的水平时间进度表。

sentences.english: Insects are famous for their dot-like eyes, known as ommatidia.
sentences.chinese: 昆虫以它们类似圆点的眼睛而闻名。

sentences.english: But if you use Green's theorem, well, we never used the fact that it is the circle of radius A at the origin.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你用格林公式，就不用管圆点是否在圆心。

sentences.english: The dots would be multiplying and spreading.
sentences.chinese: 小圆点将成倍增加，逐渐蔓延。

sentences.english: Left-click at the same place again to clear the breakpoint, and observe the disk disappear.
sentences.chinese: 再单击一次可以清除此断点，同时圆点消失。

sentences.english: On the iridium-point pen pen tip that silver-white color's small dot, is the iridium.
sentences.chinese: 铱金笔笔尖上那颗银白色的小圆点，就是锇铱合金。

sentences.english: Headings don’t generally include periods or other ending punctuation.
sentences.chinese: 标题一般不包括圆点或其它结束语句标点符号。

sentences.english: They have polka dots on them.
Hence the use of the dot notation.
sentences.chinese: 圆点标记法来解决这个问题。

definition: checked pattern/square box character (in Chinese text) indicating illegible character
